actions.Chain: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d6 + 6 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 17+1d6 + 14). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the giant can't use this attack on anyone else.
actions.Rock: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9+1d6 + 6 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
